xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides functions that perform different hash operations. For example, they compute MD5 and various SHA functions on either strings or binary. The result is the base64 encoded value of the hash.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Gabriel Petrovay, Markus Pilman, Matthias Brantner

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Computes the MD5 hash of the string provided as parameter.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:md5
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:md5($value as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Computes the SHA1 hash of the string provided as parameter.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:sha1
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:sha1($value as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function computes the MD5 hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The MD5 hash of the provided binary.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:md5-binary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:md5-binary($value as xs:base64Binary) as xs:base64Binary

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function computes the SHA1 hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The base64 encoded SHA1 hash of the provided binary.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:sha1-binary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:sha1-binary($value as xs:base64Binary) as xs:base64Binary

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function computes a hash value of the string provided as parameter. The function expects the hash algorithm to be used as parameter.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $alg The algorithm to use for this hashing operation. Supported algorithms are "md5", "sha1", and "sha256".
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The hash as xs:base64binary of the provided string
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:hash
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:hash($value as xs:string, $alg as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This function computes a hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $value The binary item to be hashed.
$alg The algorithm to use for this hashing operation. Supported algorithms are "md5", "sha1", and "sha256".
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The hash as xs:base64Binary of the provided binary
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: hash:hash-binary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function hash:hash-binary($value as xs:base64Binary, $alg as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external
